byline.contributor: Raphael Minder contributed reporting from Madrid.

abstract: French authorities identify Ayoub El Kahzzani as suspect in aborted attack on passenger train; Kahzzani is known to French and Spanish security agencies, and may have traveled to Syria in 2014; officials also say he may be connected with Verviers Islamic terrorist network, recently dismantled by Belgian authorities.
lead_paragraph: The gunman is believed to be Ayoub El Kahzani, of Moroccan origin, who was known to the Spanish and French security services and is reported to have traveled to Syria last year.

headline.main: Profile Emerges of Suspect in Attack on Train to Paris
headline.print_headline: Profile Emerges of Suspect in an Attack on a Train to Paris

snippet: The gunman is believed to be Ayoub El Kahzani, of Moroccan origin, who was known to the Spanish and French security services and is reported to have traveled to Syria last year.
